text: The Peru women's national under-20 volleyball team represents Peru in women's under-20 volleyball Events, it is controlled and managed by the Peruvian Volleyball Federation that is a member of South American volleyball body Confederación Sudamericana de Voleibol (CSV) and the international volleyball body government the Federation Internationale de Volleyball (FIVB). ==Results== ===FIVB U20 World Championship=== Champions Runners up Third place Fourth place {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !colspan=9|FIVB U20 World Championship Championship Information |- !Year !Round !Position !
